usg: Use to create an anchor element. Set a valid absoulte or relative URL to the attribute 'href' so that the contents of the element can wor as a hyperlink. Set the attribute 'trget' to open the link the specified frame. Set the the 'download' attribute to make the target get downloaded. Instead of URL set a URL fragment which stars with the character '#' followed by an 'id' attribute value of an element to navigate to a section in the same page.
